snippet: Despite its huge global audience, Formula One has struggled in the United States, but on Sunday the circuit returned to America for the first time in five years with a race in Texas.
abstract: Formula One racing, which has struggled in the United States despite huge global audience, returns to US after five year absence with race in Austin, Texas; Texas race and potential race in New Jersey set for 2014 may provide setting for greater acceptance.
lead_paragraph: Despite its huge global audience, Formula One has struggled in the United States, but on Sunday the circuit returned to America for the first time in five years with a race in Texas.

headline.seo: A Truly Foreign Concept: Formula One in Texas
headline.main: A Truly Foreign Concept: Formula One in Texas
headline.print_headline: A Truly Foreign Concept: Formula One in Texas
